detail.text: Total CAPEX: - Displays bar chart comparing Total CAPEX across all projects - Values in millions ($M) - Consistent color scheme per project
Duration: - Displays bar chart comparing project duration - Values in months - Consistent color scheme per project
%Progress Fisik R: - Displays bar chart comparing physical progress (Rencana) - Values in percentage (%) - Consistent color scheme per project
%Progress Fisik A: - Displays bar chart comparing physical progress (Aktual) - Values in percentage (%) - Consistent color scheme per project
Anggaran Terserap R: - Displays bar chart comparing budget absorption (Rencana) - Values in millions ($M) - Consistent color scheme per project
Anggaran Terserap A: - Displays bar chart comparing budget absorption (Aktual) - Values in millions ($M) - Consistent color scheme per project
SPI: - Displays bar chart comparing Schedule Performance Index - Values as index (decimal) - Consistent color scheme per project
Interactive Bar Chart: - Responsive design - Hover tooltips showing exact values - Color-coded bars per project - Grid lines for better readability
Project Labels: - X-axis shows project names (Project 1-18) - Rotated 45 degrees for better readability - Consistent font size and color
Y-axis Scaling: - Dynamic scaling based on data values - Appropriate labels with units - Grid lines for reference
Tooltip Information: - Shows project name - Shows metric value with proper formatting - Includes currency/unit symbols where applicable
Project Count: - Displays total number of projects (18) - Always visible at bottom of dashboard
Current Metric: - Shows currently selected comparison metric - Updates when tabs are switched
Unit Display: - Shows unit of measurement for current metric - Displays 'Index' for dimensionless values like SPI
Consistent Colors: - Each project maintains the same color across all charts - 18 different colors for visual distinction - Professional color palette
Chart Area: - Fixed height (500px) for consistency - Light gray background - Rounded corners - Proper padding and margins
Tab Design: - Card-style tabs - Large size for easy clicking - Clear active state indication
Role: All users can access this dashboard
Default View: Opens with Total CAPEX tab selected
Tab Switching: - Instant switching between different metrics - Chart data updates immediately - Summary information updates accordingly
Data Display: - All 18 projects shown on every chart - Values formatted appropriately (currency, percentage, index) - Consistent scaling for comparison
